overview: Kimberly has over 13 years of strategic Global Product Marketing and leadership positions and a strong track record of managing product launches and campaigns that supercede targets. In her most recent role with ACN Communications, she launched and managed a suite of consumer telecom products that exceeded $200million and achieved double-digit growth. Through upsell and cross-sell marketing campaigns she added millions in GM from the existing customer base. Prior to ACN, Kimberly was responsible for the strategic development, design, and positioning of the Global Crossing customer self-service web portal, growing users to 90% of the total target market. She received her MBA from the University of Michigan and holds BA in Business Administration from Alma College in mid-Michigan.
